title: NIV Audio Bible Dramatized MP3.Lyrics.Cover
description:
This is, hands-down, the best audio Bible I've ever owned.  It gets the Bible inside your head like nothing else I've ever seen or heard.  It has awesome scripture recitation, excellent background orchestration and sound effects.

This new and final (hopefully) version is enhanced in the folowing ways:
1. 1 Album, 66 disks (1-per book), 1189 tracks (1-per chapter)
2. A small handful of tagging errors have been corrected
3. Filenames and track names changed to allow optimal iPod playback
4. Cover art
5. Lyrics!!!

Again, I offer props to TVDude (http://thepiratebay.se/user/TVdude/) for providing the original source material for this .torrent here - http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/3864547/NIV_Audio_Bible_Dramatized_MP3.

I've simply (or not so simply) done a LOT of tag work, particularly with the lyrics.  I absolutely love reading the Scripture while listening to it.  It is doubly effective, it seems.

I hope that you may enjoy and benefit from it as much as I am.  If you do, may I suggest dropping the coin (List Price: $34.99 (USD)) to buy the actual product?  Remember Proverbs 23:23 (NIV) - "Buy the truth and do not sell it; get wisdom, discipline and understanding."

Cheers,
Papa Stefano
